title: Ukrainian military had 63 combat engagements with Russian forces near Synkivka of Kharkiv region, Rozdolivka of Donetsk regio...
content: Ukrainian military had 63 combat engagements with Russian forces near Synkivka of Kharkiv region, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region, Ivanivske and Klischiyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Tonenke, Pervomayske, Orlivka, Oleksandropil and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka and Pobyeda, Robotyne and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, at the eastern bank of Dnipro river in Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
